titleStmt.title: Remarks of A. Pulton, master in the Savoy, upon Dr Tho. Tenison's late narrative with a confutation of the doctors rule of faith, and a reply to A. Chresners pretended Vindication.
titleStmt.author: Pulton, A. (Andrew), 1654-1710.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
